Compute z-scores

Source: R/zscore.R
zscore.Rd

Compute z-scores

zscore(x, na.rm = getOption("na.rm", FALSE))

Arguments

x

a numeric vector

na.rm

a logical indicating whether missing values should be removed

Examples

data(penguins, package = "palmerpenguins")
penguins %>% 
  group_by(species) %>% 
  mutate(zbill_length_mm = zscore(bill_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  head()
#> # A tibble: 6 × 9
#> # Groups:   species [1]
#>   species island    bill_length_mm bill_de…¹ flipp…² body_…³ sex    year zbill…⁴
#>   <fct>   <fct>              <dbl>     <dbl>   <int>   <int> <fct> <int>   <dbl>
#> 1 Adelie  Torgersen           39.1      18.7     181    3750 male   2007   0.116
#> 2 Adelie  Torgersen           39.5      17.4     186    3800 fema…  2007   0.266
#> 3 Adelie  Torgersen           40.3      18       195    3250 fema…  2007   0.566
#> 4 Adelie  Torgersen           NA        NA        NA      NA NA     2007  NA    
#> 5 Adelie  Torgersen           36.7      19.3     193    3450 fema…  2007  -0.785
#> 6 Adelie  Torgersen           39.3      20.6     190    3650 male   2007   0.191
#> # … with abbreviated variable names ¹​bill_depth_mm, ²​flipper_length_mm,
#> #   ³​body_mass_g, ⁴​zbill_length_mm
